query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS market_price_history (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  market_id INT NOT NULL,
  condition_id VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  price INT NOT NULL COMMENT '價格（以分為單位，0-10000 代表 0%-100%）',
  volume INT DEFAULT 0 COMMENT '交易量（美元，以分為單位）',
  timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL COMMENT '價格記錄時間',
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX idx_market_id (market_id),
  INDEX idx_condition_id (condition_id),
  INDEX idx_timestamp (timestamp),
  INDEX idx_market_timestamp (market_id, timestamp)
) COMMENT='市場歷史價格數據表'
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 4EZig2ebo1q21z8.root --database 4sa6kfx5mFXsBhiWnpTsNp --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS market_price_history (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  market_id INT NOT NULL,
  condition_id VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  price INT NOT NULL COMMENT '價格（以分為單位，0-10000 代表 0%-100%）',
  volume INT DEFAULT 0 COMMENT '交易量（美元，以分為單位）',
  timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL COMMENT '價格記錄時間',
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX idx_market_id (market_id),
  INDEX idx_condition_id (condition_id),
  INDEX idx_timestamp (timestamp),
  INDEX idx_market_timestamp (market_id, timestamp)
) COMMENT='市場歷史價格數據表'
